titleStmt.title: A brief defence of infant-baptism with an appendix, wherein is shewed that it is not necessary that baptism should be administred by dipping / by John Ollyffe ...
titleStmt.author: Ollyffe, John, 1647-1717.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jonathan Robinson ... and are to be sold by John Woolfryes ...,
